类型: Size: LargeColor: A5 White Strawberry Baby Tee
评论详情: This top is very cute. I would not call it a baby tee as I associate that with being very tight and very short, like a toddler’s shirt would fit a fully grown person. This has some room on me, thankfully, and has some smaller sleeves and definitely a cropped fit. Perfect for the summertime as it’s not clinging to me. The print is perfect and it’s not see-through.
